Posts.Content: Apr 3, 2016 08:30PM Hopefulr wrote: Hello all- looking for information about copper depletion to treat TNBC or BC. I want my mom to try this treatment while she is NED. Thank you!
Posts.Title: Copper depletion - Trial or taking the drug outside of trial? grahaad1 Bestbird

Posts.Content: Hopefulr wrote: Hello there, I have been following Dr. VADHAT's work with copper depletion to prevent reocurrance in breast cancer, and triple negative BC. Has anyone participated in this trial or tried it off trial with their doctors? The phase III trial has been halted due to the pharm. company that uses this method and drug for wilson disease, is not allowing the large scale testing of their drug for testing. I am going to try and collect info to convince my mom's oncologist to try this for her. Thanks for the help! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: copper depletion to prevent BC ANY INFO? ANYONE TRIED THIS? Hopefulr 4everStrong
